text.text: The Graal-Nourricier-Lac Suzanne property (Graal) is one of the company's 14 properties in Northern Quebec that have a strong potential to host a variety of electric vehicle (EV) metals including nickel, copper and cobalt.  The properties were staked or acquired outright or via option agreements in 2020 and 2021 as part of a strategic move to add to the companyâ€™s current cobalt mineralization discoveries in the Cobalt Camp and as an expedient approach to the increasing demand for EV battery metals.
